description: This source file provides frontend service functions for user administration tasks such as fetching user data and updating user roles via API endpoints. It interacts with external API client functions and manages the visibility of sensitive operations based on backend configuration.

methods.name: getAdminApiStatus()
methods.description: Determines if the admin API is configured by checking the API base URL; returns an object indicating availability and base URL.

methods.name: fetchUsers()
methods.description: Fetches the list of users from the backend admin endpoint if available; returns an object with list of users or an error message if API is not configured.

methods.name: updateUserRole({ userId, email, role })
methods.description: Updates a specified user’s role via backend endpoint if available; returns success status and message.

ctags.name: updateUserRole
ctags.pattern: /^export async function updateUserRole({ userId, email, role }) {$/
